string.value: PhET is made freely available through grants which require us to collect a minimal amount of anonymous information to help document the amount of use of PhET sims and to better serve our users' update needs.
Allow sending of information to PhET
The information shown below will be sent to PhET when the simulation starts.
In all PhET simulations, we collect a minimal amount of information when the simulation starts. You can disable the sending of this information at any time via the Preferences button.
By clicking "Accept and Continue", you agree to PhET's licensing and privacy policies. (For details, click here).
The PhET project provides a suite of interactive educational simulations.
PhET interactive simulations by The PhET Team, University of Colorado are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial 3.0 United States License.
The PhET source code is licensed under a Creative Commons GNU General Public License.
For more information about licensing, click here. If you are interested in alternative license options, please contact PhET at phethelp@colorado.edu.
